author: etnu
msg: Modified BasicHttpCache to use an LRU cache instead of a map.

author: etnu
msg: Added a simple LRU cache implementation for use in numerous places where in memory caching is necessary.
The test cases for this are using junit4 instead of junit3 as an experiment. This will either be converted to junit3 or all other tests will be converted to junit4 in the future.

author: joerg
msg: COCOON-1557: change access of getContext() to protected (as in 2.2)

author: wsmoak
msg: [MRM-804] Execute the repository content consumers for the uploaded or generated pom file so that artifacts will be available in search and browse immediately after uploading.
